languages.text: "К сожалению, мое личное расследование зашло в тупик. Полагаю, придется задействовать сторонние ресурсы, чтобы продолжить поиски..." {n}Хейнрикс на глазах мрачнеет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "К сожалению, мое личное расследование зашло в тупик. Полагаю, придется задействовать сторонние ресурсы, чтобы продолжить поиски..." {n}Хейнрикс на глазах мрачнеет.{/n}

languages.text: "Unfortunately, my personal investigation has hit a dead end. I think I will have to call upon outside resources to continue the search..." {n}You see Heinrix's expression sour at these last words.{/n}
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, мое личное расследование зашло в тупик. Полагаю, придется задействовать сторонние ресурсы, чтобы продолжить поиски..." {n}Хейнрикс на глазах мрачнеет.{/n}

"Unfortunately, my personal investigation has hit a dead end. I think I will have to call upon outside resources to continue the search..." {n}You see Heinrix's expression sour at these last words.{/n}

languages.text: “遗憾的是，我的个人调查陷入了僵局。我想，我必须借助外部线索，才能继续进行调查……”{n}你注意到，海因里希说出最后一句话时，他的脸色很难看。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, my personal investigation has hit a dead end. I think I will have to call upon outside resources to continue the search..." {n}You see Heinrix's expression sour at these last words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，我的个人调查陷入了僵局。我想，我必须借助外部线索，才能继续进行调查……”{n}你注意到，海因里希说出最后一句话时，他的脸色很难看。{/n}

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, mi investigación personal ha llegado a un callejón sin salida. Tendré que emplear recursos externos para continuar la búsqueda...». {n}El gesto de Heinrix se tuerce al decir esto último.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, my personal investigation has hit a dead end. I think I will have to call upon outside resources to continue the search..." {n}You see Heinrix's expression sour at these last words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, mi investigación personal ha llegado a un callejón sin salida. Tendré que emplear recursos externos para continuar la búsqueda...». {n}El gesto de Heinrix se tuerce al decir esto último.{/n}

languages.text: 「残念ながら、私の個人的な調査は行き詰まっている。捜索を続けるには、外部の力を借りなければならないようだ…」{n}この言葉にハインリックスの表情が険しくなるのがわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, my personal investigation has hit a dead end. I think I will have to call upon outside resources to continue the search..." {n}You see Heinrix's expression sour at these last words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、私の個人的な調査は行き詰まっている。捜索を続けるには、外部の力を借りなければならないようだ…」{n}この言葉にハインリックスの表情が険しくなるのがわかる。{/n}

languages.text: « Malheureusement, mon enquête est au point mort. Je vais sûrement devoir faire appel à des ressources extérieures pour poursuivre mes recherches, » {n}admet Heinrix avec amertume.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, my personal investigation has hit a dead end. I think I will have to call upon outside resources to continue the search..." {n}You see Heinrix's expression sour at these last words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, mon enquête est au point mort. Je vais sûrement devoir faire appel à des ressources extérieures pour poursuivre mes recherches, » {n}admet Heinrix avec amertume.{/n}

languages.text: "Leider bin ich mit meiner persönliche Untersuchung in einer Sackgasse gelandet. Ich muss wohl auf externe Ressourcen zurückgreifen, um die Suche fortzusetzen ..." {n}Du siehst, wie sich Heinrix' Miene während seiner letzten Worten verzieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, my personal investigation has hit a dead end. I think I will have to call upon outside resources to continue the search..." {n}You see Heinrix's expression sour at these last words.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, my personal investigation has hit a dead end. I think I will have to call upon outside resources to continue the search..." {n}You see Heinrix's expression sour at these last words.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki şahsi soruşturmam durma noktasına geldi. Sanırım araştırmaya devam etmek için dışarıdan yardım almam gerekecek..." {n}Söylediği son kelimelerle birlikte Heinrix'in yüzünü ekşittiğini görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, my personal investigation has hit a dead end. I think I will have to call upon outside resources to continue the search..." {n}You see Heinrix's expression sour at these last words.{/n}
